overview: Lua and her grandfather can’t see each other, she’s in France and he’s in Brazil. They talk to each other through their phone camera. But when Grandpa is suddenly no longer there, Lua’s life is turned upside down.At a time when it is forbidden to get togother to bury our dead, a little girl separated by an ocean from her grandfather invents a way to say goodbye to him.
title: Tchau Tchau
